tasks.content: *11E, *11F AECOM CANADA - Live Inventory
tasks.description:
Please open a ticket with Avetti to question how live inventory can be kept on a non-integrated site where inventory is shared between skus and sites.

I have learned how to upload inventory amounts into Avetti and the thought (Mike Plourde) was that Avetti would automatically deduct as items were ordered, we would only need to load new inventory as it is received and checked in.  However, one site *11E is a credit card site and one *11F is a punch out site.  My understanding is that Avetti would not keep track of the punch out orders or deduct inventory because it is just passing through.  Also, both sites mentioned share skus....and we have an English and a French version of each sku.  I'm open to troubleshooting this with someone.  

Live global inventory is important to AECOM, so this is a priority.

tasks.content: Ingersoll Rand- Need to revise POP UP window on check out pages for all cags *INTERNATIONAL & DOMESTIC*
tasks.description:
***We need to update the POP UP window for international orders on the check out page on all cags to the following: 

Please note that you have selected international shipping for this order. 
Your order confirmation will show no shipping total as we will send you an email quote for approval after your order is placed. 
Duties and Taxes will not be included in the quote but will be approximately 20% of your order total and will be billed separately (invoice will be sent out within 30-45 days after the order has shipped) 

For all International orders please allow an additional 7 business days to account for transit and customs.

Due to new restrictions from UPS/FEDEX on AIR shipping shipments of products with lithium ion batteries a sur charge of $50.00 per box will apply to the order (this is in addition to the freight estimate emailed to you). 

***For Domestic shipping orders- also create a pop up (to function just like the International one we have). 

Due to new restrictions from UPS/FEDEX on AIR shipping shipments of products with lithium ion batteries a sur charge of $50.00 per box will apply to the order (this is in addition to the freight estimate emailed to you).
This sur charge will not apply if shipping GROUND method. 

The POP UP window still needs to have the I accept button for the client to click to confirm acknowledgement- for both international and domestic. 

Cags
*38A
*38B
*38C
*38D
*38E
*38H
*38J
*38L
